title: How we adapt
creator_credit: William Banting, CTV Television Network and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Notes the increasing amount of stress and stress-related illness in people’s lives. Emphasises the fact that, like some illnesses, stress may also be psychosomatic and controllable by the adoption of stress management techniques. Suitable for tertiary level.
